Question: Aidata  Corp. Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
aiMotive Corp. Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight: aiData

- Revolutionary feature for automatic annotation of massive datasets in hours
- Empowers users with AI-powered text- and image-based search
- Unprecedented efficiency and precision in the retrieval and composition of training data for automated driving
- Part of the suite of products including aiSim and aiWare
- Enables customers to unlock unprecedented efficiency and precision in the retrieval and composition of training data for automated driving
